title: Snowboarder Elena Hight on reframing failure and accepting new challenges
description:
Elena Hight is a two-time Olympian who never fulfilled her dream of making it onto a half-pipe podium at the Olympic Games. She joined the podcast to talk about her new film called Blank Canvas that focuses on the fresh challenge that's ignited her passion to achieve great things: backcountry snowboarding.

Blank Canvas trailer
